ExpSyntax.val: Trim({0,18}) &'&ParamCaraBayar=' &CASE( {0,14}, 'B', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'U', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'S', 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39) & 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), '' )

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT OCRD.DocEntry, OCRD.CardName, OCRD.GTSRegNum, OINV.U_IDU_Kode_PT, OINV.NumAtCard, ORCT.Comments, OINV.BPChCode, ocrd2.CardName, ORCT.DocDate, ORCT.DocTotal, RCT2.SumApplied, OINV.EDocNum FROM RCT2 (NOLOCK) JOIN ORCT (NOLOCK) ON RCT2.DocNum = ORCT.DocEntry JOIN OINV (NOLOCK) ON RCT2.DocEntry = OINV.DocEntry JOIN OCRD (NOLOCK) ON OINV.CardCode = OCRD.CardCode LEFT JOIN OCRD ocrd2 (NOLOCK) ON OINV.BPChCode = ocrd2.CardCode WHERE ORCT.Canceled = 'N' AND OINV.CANCELED = 'N' AND ORCT.DocDate BETWEEN ':4' AND ':5' :1 :2 :3 ORDER BY ORCT.DocDate

ExpSyntax.val: CASE( {0,13}, 'B', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'U', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'S', 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39) & 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), '' )

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT OCRD.DocEntry, OCRD.CardName, OCRD.GTSRegNum, OINV.U_IDU_Kode_PT, OINV.NumAtCard, ORCT.Comments, OINV.BPChCode, ocrd2.CardName, ORCT.DocDate, ORCT.DocTotal, RCT2.SumApplied, OINV.EDocNum FROM RCT2 (NOLOCK) JOIN ORCT (NOLOCK) ON RCT2.DocNum = ORCT.DocEntry JOIN OINV (NOLOCK) ON RCT2.DocEntry = OINV.DocEntry JOIN OCRD (NOLOCK) ON OINV.CardCode = OCRD.CardCode LEFT JOIN OCRD ocrd2 (NOLOCK) ON OINV.BPChCode = ocrd2.CardCode WHERE ORCT.Canceled = 'N' AND OINV.CANCELED = 'N' AND ORCT.DocDate BETWEEN ':4' AND ':5' :1 :2 :3 ORDER BY ORCT.DocDate

ExpSyntax.val: CASE( {0,13}, 'B', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'U', 'AND ocrd2.CardName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'S', 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%BPJS%'&ASCIIChr(39) & 'AND ocrd2.CardName NOT LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%UMUM%'&ASCIIChr(39), '' )
